div.p: According to Wikipedia, a newsagent is the owner of a newsagent's shop (or news stand in US English). The stock in his or her shop contains items that are expected to interest the market. Earlier this year I realized that some of my experience indeed were regarded as useful in more glossy contexts.
All of a sudden Knoppix Admin and Linux Format PHP coding is Glossy.
